item.title: Azure Functions CLI and templates
item.description: Commands In Azure CLI List the subscription accounts \$ az account list Set the default subscription \$ az account set --subscription mysubscription Creating Function app with consomption plan #!/bin/bash # Function app and storage account names must be unique. storageName=mystorageaccount$RANDOM functionAppName=myserverlessfunc$RANDOM region=westeurope # Create a resource group. az group create --name myResourceGroup --location $region # Create an Azure storage account in the resource group. az storage account create \ --name $storageName \ --location $region \ --resource-group myResourceGroup \ --sku Standard_LRS # Create a serverless function app in the resource group.
